instruction_text:
To reset a user password in AWS IAM:

1. Use the AWS CLI command:
   aws iam update-login-profile --user-name USERNAME --password NEW_PASSWORD --password-reset-required

2. Replace USERNAME with the actual username
3. Replace NEW_PASSWORD with the new password (must meet AWS password requirements)
4. The --password-reset-required flag forces the user to change their password on next login

For Active Directory password reset:
1. Open Active Directory Users and Computers
2. Navigate to the user account
3. Right-click and select 'Reset Password'
4. Enter new password and confirm
5. Check 'User must change password at next logon' if needed

For local Windows account password reset:
1. Open Computer Management
2. Navigate to Local Users and Groups > Users
3. Right-click the user account
4. Select 'Set Password'
5. Enter and confirm the new password
